Reviews.Title: This is my wife's phone.
Reviews.Author: Christopher Okray
Reviews.Content: This works really well for my wife.  She uses it on FoxFire and it plays nice with most everyone.  Enjoy.

Reviews.Title: Alcatel One Touch OT-808-A
Reviews.Author: Lorie P.
Reviews.Content: was just what I wanted and will get another when I can great service, lots of e-mail help and was fast and friendly
